nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.transaction

Class TransactionListeners

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.transaction.TransactionListeners

  • public class TransactionListeners
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains a list of transaction commit and rollback listeners
    Author:
    luis

      void addCommitListener(TransactionCommitListener listener)
      Adds a commit listener
      void addEndListener(TransactionEndListener listener)
      Adds an end listener
      void addRollbackListener(TransactionRollbackListener listener)
      Adds a rollback listener
      void runCommitListeners()
      Runs the commit listeners
      void runListeners(boolean commit)
      Either invokes runCommitListeners() when the flag is true or runRollbackListeners() when the flag is false

      Runs the rollback listeners
